question: What is the Student Body Organization (SBO)?
answer: The Student Body Organization represents all students at Sultan Kudarat State University - Isulan Campus. We organize events, provide services, advocate for student rights, and ensure your voice is heard in university decisions.

question: How do I contact the SBO?
answer: Email: sksustudentbodyorganizationisu@gmail.com | Visit us: Learning Commons, 2nd floor | Facebook: facebook.com/SKSUSBO | Check our website: sboweb.vercel.app

question: What events does SBO organize?
answer: We organize assemblies, community immersions, Innovation Sprints, and student-led programs throughout the year. Check our Events page at sboweb.vercel.app/events.html or follow our Facebook page for updates!

question: Who are the SBO officers?
answer: View our complete officer roster at sboweb.vercel.app/officers.html. Our team includes the President, VP, Secretary, Treasurer, and department representatives elected by students.

question: Where can I find SBO news and announcements?
answer: Visit our Newsroom at sboweb.vercel.app/newsroom.html for notices, awards, and updates. Recent: Midterm Exam Schedule (Sept 27), Innovation Sprints registration (Oct 12), USG Senate results.

question: What services does the SBO provide?
answer: We offer: SBO Helpdesk (campus service excellence), Barangay Innovation Fellows (community projects), Transparency Portal (budget dashboard), and student advocacy. Visit sboweb.vercel.app/impact.html for more.

question: Where can I download the Student Manual?
answer: Download the SKSU Student Manual (PDF) at: sboweb.vercel.app/sksumanual.pdf - It contains all university policies, guidelines, and student rights information.

question: What are the SBO's current initiatives?
answer: Current programs: Barangay Innovation Fellows (12 community pilots deployed Aug 2025), Transparency Portal (real-time budget tracking Sept 2025), and Innovation Sprints. Visit sboweb.vercel.app/initiatives.html

question: How can I evaluate SBO performance or give feedback?
answer: Visit our Evaluation page at sboweb.vercel.app/initiatives.html to share your feedback, suggestions, or concerns. Your input helps us serve you better!

question: What are SBO's social media accounts?
answer: Facebook: facebook.com/SKSUSBO | Instagram: @sksusbo | YouTube: SKSU SBO Channel | Follow us for daily updates, event photos, and announcements!

question: When are the midterm exams?
answer: Midterm Examination Schedule for 1st Semester A.Y. 2025-2026 was announced Sept 27, 2025. Check sboweb.vercel.app/newsroom.html or your department bulletin for the complete schedule.

question: How do I register for Innovation Sprints?
answer: Innovation Sprints registration opened October 12, 2025 for the October 28 event. Visit sboweb.vercel.app/events.html for registration details and requirements.
